official_title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of precious stones exported for processing abroad into jewelry for the personal use of the exporter.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide that the value of precious stones exported by an individual for processing into an article of jewelry shall be excluded in determining the value of such jewelry if it is imported by that individual, unless such jewelry is sold within three years after importation.

titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of precious stones exported for processing abroad into jewelry for the personal use of the exporter.
